name: Brooch Wedding Bouquet
description:
Who needs flowers when brooches last forever..?  I think Brooch Bouquets are absolutely beautiful and an absolutely must for the bride who wants to be a little different.  

All brooches in the bouquet are mostly vintage with some new ones thrown in here and there.  I'd be more than happy to include any brooches that you already have.  Each bouquet is a bit different.  We can use brooches with your wedding colors or anything else you can dream of.  

I would suggest sending an email to me before you order this item so we can discuss all the details.

name: DIY Handmade Business for Crafts, Vintage, and Art
description:
This is the essential DIY guide for any creative person looking to build a successful business.  Quit your day job and make a living selling what you LOVE.  

This book has all the information you could ever need for creating, managing, and growing a successful handmade business.  Absolutely EVERYTHING is included.  It's as specific and detailed as you can possibly get in a handmade business guide.  There isn't another one out there in the marketplace.  

After you read each section, I've created  "homework" that allows you to slowly build your business from the ground up.  We talk about products, branding, pricing, photography, selling online, selling at markets, selling to retailers, sales tax, business, time management, and so much more.  

This eBook is a digital download that will be sent to you within 24hrs of payment.  All content and images are © 2013 Kate Clark.

name: Beach Sand Earrings in Antique Bronze
description:
Maine beach sand has been taken and captured under a glass dome. The granular bits of sand look slightly enlarged under the glass dome and the texture is truly amazing. The glass earring dome is about the size of a dime. This item is also lead and nickel free.

Antique Bronze french wire. All jewelry is tucked inside a gray velvet pouch and ready to be given as a gift ♥

Handmade by Shoreside Chic in Portland, Maine.

name: Butterfly Hair Pins- Set of Three
description: A pale blue, orange, and yellow butterfly have been affixed to bronze hair pins. They are very secure and will not fall out of your hair.  In this listing, you will receive all three butterflies.

name: Clam Shell Jewelry Dish- Botanical Retro Leaves
description:
We have some new fabric prints in the shop!  

This jewelry dish is made from a white clam shell and is lined on the inside with fabric. Each clam shell is different so the size will vary. Approx width of the clam shell is 4 inches. It's a great item to put on your dresser or a shelf in the bathroom to hold your jewelry.

Handmade with ♥ by Shoreside Chic in Portland, Maine.

name: Seaglass Coin Bead Earrings in Plum
description:
A plum purple sea glass coin bead dangles from a gold plated kidney ear wire. This item is lead and nickel free.

These earrings are very lightweight. They measure about 1.50 inches long.

These earrings are available in a gold finish or silver finish ear wire.

Necklace is approx 17 inches long and closure is a matching lobster clasp.

All items are tucked inside a gray velvet pouch and ready to be given as a gift ♥

Handmade by Shoreside Chic in Portland, Maine.

description:

It can be lengthened or shortened if you'd like, please let me know if you need to the length adjusted.
